channel.title: [317] Scronix PK
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2m5fk12.png[/img] By Jesse
[u][size=24pt]Introduction[/size][/u]
Scronix is my first ever server I actually put effort in, and which I hosted. I release this because I don't want to host a PK server anymore, I am currently working on a new Economy source. Please post some constructive critism, as I am a beginner and this is my first release. Note that this is based of Teamtorva, so it won't be perfect.
[u][size=24pt]Features[/size][/u]
Perfect Combat PK Outside Barbarian Village Funpk (Currently disabled due bugs) 100% Barrows Duel Arena (ALL dupes fixed) Cricital Attacks (Ranging and Melee) Corporeal Beast Lottery Loyalty Titles PK Supplies (Achievement Tab) Customized shops Unique donator zone Unique staff zone 100% Tzhaar Cave Warrior Guild 80% Chaos Elemental 100% Dicing Master, Pure & Setlevel commands ALL bugs fixed Curses Killstreak System Boss Point system Auto Cache Downloader
And ALOT more, just download if you want to see.
[u][size=24pt]Media[/size][/u]
[i]Video[/i]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=V_4m9wtznMc
[i]Pictures[/i]
[IMG]http://i1199.photobucket.com/albums/aa470/Partyhad/1-kopie_zpsc2c5a1f6.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1199.photobucket.com/albums/aa470/Partyhad/2_zps341e4567.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1199.photobucket.com/albums/aa470/Partyhad/4_zpsd2f56059.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1199.photobucket.com/albums/aa470/Partyhad/5_zps793f722f.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1199.photobucket.com/albums/aa470/Partyhad/6_zpsfa9cc09e.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1199.photobucket.com/albums/aa470/Partyhad/7_zpsfca26215.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1199.photobucket.com/albums/aa470/Partyhad/8_zps0a19b301.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1199.photobucket.com/albums/aa470/Partyhad/9_zps76944658.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1199.photobucket.com/albums/aa470/Partyhad/10_zps84e00991.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1199.photobucket.com/albums/aa470/Partyhad/11_zps8779afbb.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1199.photobucket.com/albums/aa470/Partyhad/12_zpsdcbf5de8.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1199.photobucket.com/albums/aa470/Partyhad/13_zpse6bf5ed1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1199.photobucket.com/albums/aa470/Partyhad/14_zpse5a855bc.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1199.photobucket.com/albums/aa470/Partyhad/15_zps758b8cfb.jpg[/img]
For more pictures look at my original advertisement thread at RSWebclients.
[u][size=24pt]Download[/size][/u]
Package (Cache included): [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?7n9nn1hz1b25c21]Download...[/url]
If you think this is a virus, scan it.
[u][size=24pt]Credits[/size][/u] Jesse (Me): 45% Pwn3d2: 20% The rest to the base/tutorials.
There is no anti-leech in there, because I don't understand why I should if I release. Goodluck with this, please post if you will use this, I'll make sure to check it :]
[/center]
